reviewText: Very simple : if you love sport ( in door wall ) or out door climbing this video will reaffirm the mental and physical challenges that drew you to this unusual activity . Most people avoid seeking out places where a single moment of weakness or bad decision can result in injury or death . These people , while they may not have a death wish , clearly don't see life the same as you and I do . I highly recommend this well made and entertaining video if you are at all curious about climbing or the people who feel the need to experience the razor edge .
